examples.example: 无论做什么事情，我们都要保持认真的态度。

translate.english: No matter what we do, we should always maintain a serious attitude.

examples.example: 他总是以认真的态度对待每一项任务，难怪会取得那么多优秀的成果。

translate.english: He always treats every task with a serious attitude. No wonder he has achieved so many excellent results.

examples.example: 他在学习上总是那么认真，所以成绩一直名列前茅。

translate.english: He is always so serious in his studies, so his grades have always been at the top.
